name: Synth'Arcade
description:
Synthwave / 80's infinite runner

Controller support only in game actually (only tested with an xbox one controller).

Mouse/Keyboard : 

directionnals arrows <- ->

Controller :

LB RB 

FYI : 
  • Menu is currently WIP, you can swipe left/right and start a game by selecting a skin.
  • Save a score with an already saved name will override the previous score.
  • Music is currently WIP, the main theme is Miami Nights 1984 - Accelerated. All credits go to the author.
